articles.description: While iPhone sales fell due to the lockdown in China, sales of streaming services jumped.
articles.content:
Image copyrightVIEW press / Getty Images
Apple saw growth for the first three months of the year, as falling device sales in China were offset by demand for its streaming services due to the coronavirus lockdown.
Sales climbed to $58.3bn (£46.2bn), up from … [+2858 chars]

articles.title: PS Plus May 2020 PS4 Games Confirmed - Push Square

articles.content:
May 2020's PlayStation Plus games have been officially revealed. And no, sadly you're not getting Dying Light and Dark Souls Remastered, as was previously rumoured. This disappointment has already prompted one of the worst received months ever.

articles.title: Poll: Are You Happy With Your PS Plus Games for May 2020? - Push Square
articles.description: Plus or minus?
articles.content:
First, the people saying dont complain cause it's free: How is it free? It's not free, it's a compensation for gouging us to play online with friends. So yeah, please complain away.

articles.title: Here’s every smartphone that supports Google Stadia mobile gameplay - 9to5Google
articles.description: Google Stadia offers streaming high-end games of your choice from the cloud without the need of expensive hardware — here's what smartphones are supported.
articles.content:
Google Stadia support is the only thing standing in the way of you being able to play triple-A videogame title no matter where you are provided you have an active Wi-Fi connection.

articles.title: iPhone SE 2 - TrustedReviews
articles.description: The iPhone SE 2 is £419/$399 making it a great deal for an Apple device. Here's our review with a look at the camera, performance and more.
articles.content:
Verdict

articles.title: The Ford Puma ST is coming this year - Top Gear
articles.description: Hot mini-crossover will likely get same 197bhp 3cyl engine as the Fiesta
articles.content:
Goes without saying were massive fans of the Fiesta ST. It was our Car of The Year back in 2018, and to this day remains thoroughly excellent in almost every way. Whoever you are, whatever your budget, you should probably buy one.

articles.author: Aaron Brown
articles.title: Samsung 4K and 8K TVs get three new channels for FREE, but there's a catch - Express
articles.description: SAMSUNG Smart TV owners can tune into three new channels for free without installing an extra app - or paying a penny for the new shows. However, these freebies are not available everywhere, so some 4K and 8K TV owners will miss out.
articles.content: Samsung Smart TV owners looking for something to watch while in lockdown will be able to tune into three new channels for free thanks to an update to the built-in Samsung TV Plus feature. For those who don't know, Samsung TV Plus is a completely free on-deman… [+1602 chars]
